posts.post_title: Pre Hobby Panic in 2009 Under $50 Bridge Jumper Sale
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Bob c.
Why wait for the predicted U.S. depression between 2009-2012? Why worry about auction house seizures, government investigations, bankruptcies and such? 

Below are a many, many items, all at depression prices! 

We will consider below-depression offers on singles or groupings. Scans absolutely available upon request. Prices include SH&I. Paypal OK. 

Thanks and here's to a healthy and prosperous New Year!
